data.text:
Charter a Private Jet to / from London Gatwick Airport

London Gatwick Airport (LGW, EGKK) is located in London, United Kingdom. Mercury Jets offers private jet charter services to and from London. London Gatwick Airport is one most popular London private jet charter airports.

About London Gatwick Airport (LGW, EGKK)

Mercury Jets is an on demand air charter provider specializing in private jet and turboprop charters in London Gatwick Airport.

London Gatwick (LGW, EGKK) is a major international public airport, the second largest passenger traffic in England. The airport is located 29 miles from the center of London, in West Sussex. London Gatwick covers 670 hectares and has one runway with a hard surface, annually receives more than 30 million passengers.
